'''Never Ending''' is [[Tartaglia]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Trivia==
*The talent shares a similar name with [[Never-Ending Performance (Soundtrack)|Never-Ending Performance]], which is the [[soundtrack]] that plays during [[Enter the Golden House|Tartaglia's boss fight]].
